column2: Little Goat kind of confused me. Their food was pretty good and unique (see details below)
column3: but seemed a little overpriced for diner food. Servers were inattentive
column4: as some others have said (waited about 10-15 minutes for coffee refills/drinks
column5: eventually had to flag a random server aggressively). Would probably check this place out again
column6: but not necessarily at the top of my list of recurring spots.
